entities.name: chamber of secrets
entities.description: The Chamber of Secrets is mentioned as the location where a student has been taken by the monster.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is introduced as one of the teachers who arrives in the staff room and announces that a student has been taken by the monster.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is mentioned as one of the teachers who reacts to the news with fear and tears.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is introduced as one of the teachers who claps her hands over her mouth in shock.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is mentioned as one of the teachers who reacts to the news with skepticism.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is introduced as one of the teachers who asks which student has been taken by the monster.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as the house whose heir left a message in the Chamber.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall announces that a student has been taken by the monster into the Chamber itself.
The heir of Slytherin left another message in the Chamber, underneath the first one.
Professor Flitwick bursts into tears upon hearing the news that a student has been taken by the monster.
Madam Hooch asks which student has been taken by the monster.
Severus Snape questions Professor McGonagall about how she is sure that a student has been taken by the monster.
